Name: 'Mech-Wide Shortcuts
Details: Across the top of the screen, there are helpful shortcuts for a few common tasks. "Repair All" repairs all the structure damage on a 'Mech. "Strip Equipment" removes all weapons and equipment from a 'Mech chassis. "Strip Armor" removes all the armor from a 'Mech, while "Max Armor" distributes armor across the entire 'Mech up to the 'Mech's maximum tonnage.
